definition: having long and narrow ornamental cuts showing an underlying fabric
details:
adjective
- having long and narrow ornamental cuts showing an underlying fabric
= example: having long and narrow ornamental cuts showing an underlying fabric
- (used of rates or prices) reduced usually sharply
= example: (used of rates or prices) reduced usually sharply
= synonyms: cut
- patterned by having color applied with sweeping strokes
= example: patterned by having color applied with sweeping strokes
